messages.content: This election is close. Your vote will secure your progress over the future years or bring it to a screeching halt. Let's not waste the last five years of hard work and let Labour and the SNP take us back to square one.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raise the personal tax threshold so that no-one earning under £50,000 pays it.
Halve the deficit as a share of the economy, keep our surplus secure by running a surplus so we can start paying down our debts.
Take family homes out of the Inheritance Tax by raising the effective threshold to £1 million.
Protected spending on the NHS – now we'll spend at least an extra £8 billion to fund and support the NHS's own action plan.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Ed Miliband and the SNP, Alex Salmond, Nicola Sturgeon
mentions.tacticalSituation: If the Conservatives are able to hold seats like Watford, they only need to win just 23 more to form a majority government — and keep Ed Miliband and the SNP out of Downing Street.

issues.economy: Halve the deficit as a share of our economy – now we'll keep our surplus secure by running a surplus so that we can start paying down our debts.
issues.governance: We're promised a strong, stable and competent Conservative government working to a clear economic plan.
issues.health: We've protected spending on the NHS – now we'll spend at least an extra £8 billion to fund and support the NHS's own action plan.

housing.content: Take family homes out of the Inheritance Tax by raising the effective threshold to £1 million.

endorsements.endorsement: Susan, your vote can be the difference at this election.

quotes.text: A vote for anyone else risks getting the chaos of Ed Miliband and Labour, propped up by Nicola Sturgeon, Alex Salmond and the SNP for the next five years.
Don't risk it – for competence instead of chaos, vote Conservative.

images.caption: David Cameron writing, with the message - 'This election is close. Your vote will secure your progress over the future years or bring it to a screeching halt.'
Susan on a phone with the campaign's economic promise highlighted.
